response.summary:
As an TAE, I partner with software developers and devops engineers to create and code tests concurrently with product development. I build and develop tools that help developers be more productive, write better code and test it themselves. Troubleshooting is an understatemen. 

I also act as a representative of the Software Test Engineering Team in scrum meetings and provide input on how to provide better quality coverage for the applications supported.
response.skills: Git, Selenium, Jenkins, Python, Allure, Behave, Cucumber, Postman, SQL, Linux, Microsoft Office, Autodesk Inventor, Microsoft Project, Matlab, Servicio de atención al cliente, Trabajo en equipo, Aptitudes para la comunicación, Reflexión estratégica, Viajes, Toma de decisiones

profile_positions.description:
Tester automation in charge of:
*Designing and developing test automation scripts
*Researching issues in software through testing
*Designing and review of functional tests cases
*Log and document errors in the tracking system
*Collaborating with QA Analysts and Software Developers to develop solutions
profile_positions.title: Automation Tester

profile_positions.description:

-  Realización de actas de obra y cotización de elementos a comprar y/o manufacturar.
- Generación de proceso de generación de simulación de fluidos (CDF) y estructural.

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com
